name: Zoomies (Pompam)
description:
Zoomies 🐱🔥

Live your best cat life and cause as much chaos as you can in your owner's absence.

Instructions 🔧❗

Turning on hardware acceleration in the browser setting is recommended!

Controls ⌨️

- W,A,S,D for movement

- SPACE to jump

- Left mouse button to swipe

- ESCAPE to pause the game

You can unlock new cats by toppling their frames to the ground. 🐱

Credits 🌺

All code, game design and visual assets are made by me.

Music by Kevin MacLeod.  🎹

Font by @kmlgames.

Wonderful cat portraits, provided by friends. 🖼️
